channel.title: Blog on SignalIT
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on SignalIT

item.title: The Beginning
item.description: I will start as a freelance workspace consultant from the start of January 2023. My focus lies on the Citrix perspective and Microsoft Azure platform. I’ve started my IT journey at the Royal Signal Battalion in the Royal Netherlands Army as a network admin. From there I joined a production company where I had my first encounter with Citrix and techniques as NVIDIA vGPU and CAD/CAM solutions like Solidworks and Autodesk applications.
